resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."

This is the Yoti automation QA exercise.
This application is made of 3 screens: The main, the login and the home screen and you should make sure that:

 	On the main screen:
 		- the title is 'Automation QA Test'
 		- the explanation text is present
 		- the button signup (disabled) and login (enabled) are present.


	On the login screen:
 		- the title is 'Login'
 		- the Yoti logo is present.
 		- that at least one of those credentials is valid and that any other is wrong: username@yoti.com:longpassword, login@yoti.com:verystrongpassword
 		- you can check that a wrong email or a wrong password trigger the appropriate error state on the text field
 		- you can check that a password shorter than 4 characters trigger the appropriate error state on the text field


	On the home screen:
 		- the title is 'Home'
 		- a 'Welcome' label is present
 		- a list is present where the last element is 'world'
 		- a logout button is present
